HomePage.title: Welcome to Next.js + shadcn/ui + Tailwind CSS
HomePage.description: Your new project is ready! This setup includes Next.js 15, shadcn/ui components, Tailwind CSS v4, TypeScript, ESLint, and Prettier with your custom configuration.

Features.prettier: ✨ Prettier configured with single quotes, semicolons, and tabs
Features.eslint: 🔧 ESLint integrated with Prettier for consistent code style
Features.theme: 🌙 Dark/Light theme toggle with system preference support
Features.i18n: 🌍 Internationalization with pt-br and en-us locales
